content.name: p
children: Components of any type can specify the custom volumes to be mounted on
specific locations within the image. Note that the volume names are
shared across all components and therefore this mechanism can also be
used to share file systems between components.

children.name: Fence
children:
schemaVersion: 2.0.0
metadata:
  name: MyDevfile
components:
  - name: MyDevfile
    container:
      image: golang
      memoryLimit: 512Mi
      mountSources: true
      command: ['sleep', 'infinity']
      volumeMounts:
        - name: cache
          path: /.cache

children.name: Fence
children:
scheamVersion: 2.0.0
metadata:
  name: MyDevfile
components:
  - name: theia-editor
    plugin:
      id: eclipse/che-theia/next
      env:
      - name: HOME
        value: $(PROJECTS_ROOT)
      volumeMounts:
      - name: cache
        path: /.cache

  name: MyDevfile

    openshift:
      reference: mongo-db.yaml
      volumeMounts:
      - name: mongo-persistent-storage
